words.source: H1121 conj. waw + noun common masculine plural construct of בֵּן 'son'; KJV 'the sons of', ESV 'the sons of', NASB 'the sons of'
H7141 (קֹרַח, 'Korah'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Korah', ESV 'Korah', NASB 'Korah'
H617 (אַסִּיר, 'Assir', meaning 'prisoner'), proper noun masculine; KJV 'Assir', ESV 'Assir', NASB 'Assir'
H511 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (אֶלְקָנָה, 'Elkanah', meaning 'God has created/possessed'); KJV 'Elkanah', ESV 'Elkanah', NASB 'Elkanah'
H23 conj. waw + proper noun masculine (אֲבִיאָסָף, 'Abiasaph', meaning 'my father has gathered'); KJV 'Abiasaph', ESV 'Abiasaph', NASB 'Abiasaph'
H428 (אֵלֶּה, 'these'), demonstrative pronoun plural; KJV 'these are', ESV 'these are', NASB 'these are'
H4940 noun common feminine plural construct of מִשְׁפָּחָה 'family, clan'; KJV 'families of', ESV 'clans of', NASB 'families of'
H7145 article + gentilic adjective masculine singular (הַקָּרְחִי, 'the Korahite'); KJV 'the Korhites', ESV 'the Korahites', NASB 'the Korahites'
